message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  I'm confident this is a fair starting point for us to begin negotiations.

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer.  While I recognize the value of the product, $14,000 is a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to offer $11,000 for it.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects both its worth and my interest in making a deal.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $11,000 is a bit too low for me to accept, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and leaves us both with a fair deal.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,000. This seems like a good compromise for both of us.
